ants.search
Class PathFinder

java.lang.Object
  ants.search.PathFinder

public abstract class PathFinder
extends java.lang.Object

stores all searchstrategies. best path can be calculated with this class.

searches the best path with the defined search strategy. the maximum cost of the path can be defined.

bestPath

public static java.util.List<Tile> bestPath(java.lang.Integer strategy,
                                            SearchTarget from,
                                            SearchTarget to,
                                            Tile searchspace0,
                                            Tile searchspace1,
                                            int maxCost)
searches the best path with the defined search strategy. the maximum cost of the path can be defined. A restricted search area can be defined where the path must be layed in.

Parameters:
strategy -
from -
to -
searchspace0 -
searchspace1 -
maxCost -
Returns:
the path in a list or null if no path is found.
